offsetFromHeadBone.description: The origin of LookAt. Position offset from the head bone

lookAtHorizontalInner.description: Horizontal inward movement. The left eye moves right. The right eye moves left.

lookAtHorizontalOuter.description: Horizontal outward movement. The left eye moves left. The right eye moves right.

lookAtVerticalDown.description: Vertical downward movement. Both eyes move upwards

lookAtVerticalUp.description: Vertical upward movement. Both eyes move downwards
